title: 求一个mac版的minecraft 1.5.2或者1.6都好
author: zqxiezitao
txt_content: 最好是懒人包 论坛上下的启动器无一例外都是显示failed to launch 求解决

replies.author: suenhao
replies.txt_content: 你找对人了，我正在上传，1.5.2的

replies.author: 冰块⑨号
replies.txt_content:
去官网下啊……
https://minecraft.net/download

Minecraft for Mac OS X 就是……
实在不行就去Minecraft for Linux / Other
